manual.translation[0].definitions[0].def: manual work involves using your hands or your physical strength rather than your mind
manual.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: People in manual occupations have a lower life expectancy.
manual.translation[0].definitions[1].def: operated or done by hand or without the help of electricity, computers etc
manual.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: It would take too long to do a manual search of all the data.
manual.translation[0].definitions[2].def: relating to how well you use your hands to make or do things
manual.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: No great manual dexterity  (=skill in using your hands) is required to perform the technique.
manual.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a book that gives instructions about how to do something, especially how to use a machine
manual.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Consult the computer manual if you have a problem.
manual.translation[2].definitions[0].def: using your hands and your physical strength or abilities, rather than your mind
manual.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: He did all kinds of manual work.
A shortage of manual labor (=people who do manual work) is keeping wages and inflation high.
manual.translation[2].definitions[1].def: operated or done by hand or without the help of power in the form of electricity etc
manual.translation[2].definitions[1].exa: The new system will automate many manual tasks.
manual.translation[3].definitions[0].def: a book giving instructions on how to operate a machine, piece of equipment etc
